content:
Hi, regarding this issue: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/87238
The suggestion in the issue is to manually reimplement Ord (or perhaps PartialOrd) for Option and Result to allow for more explicit documentation. Would this be a desirable change? The code duplication doesn't seem great.
Sounds good. I don't think there would be that much duplication (in the long run), and documenting the order seems desirable.
Thanks for the confirmation! I'll go ahead and implement it. (decided not to given it's not clear whether it's the right way to go or not, see issue)
Well, don't take my word for it, I'm not a library developer. But it sounds reasonable given the discussion in there.

It seems like it wouldn't be too much code duplication, and the improved documentation sounds worth it to me. It probably doesn't hurt to put up a PR and then discuss it there to see whether it's worthwhile.
